content:
Hello! My name is Brian. First, thank you for cargo-bisect-rustc!
I believe my team has found a bug in Cargo. It's my understanding cargo-bisect-rustc works on just the compiler. Is that correct?
hi @Brian, yeah cargo-bisect-rustc will help you find regressions on the rust compiler

A quick follow-up: Not a bug in Cargo. A misunderstanding about dependency requirements and version numbers.
Thank you @Santiago Pastorino for your time and thank you and your team for cargo-bisect-rustc.
